C(e))!N.call(r,s)&&s!==t&&q(r,s,{get:()=>e[s],enumerable:!(i=P(e,s))||i.enumerable});return r};var B=(r,e,t)=>(t=r!=null?R(j(r)):{},z(e||!r||!r.__esModule?q(t,"default",{value:r,enumerable:!0}):t,r));var E=W((_,S)=>{(function(r,e){typeof _=="object"&&typeof S<"u"?S.exports=e():typeof define=="function"&&define.amd?define(e):(r=r||self).barbaRouter=e()})(_,function(){var r="2.1.10";return new(function(){function e(){this.name="@barba/router",this.version=r,this.routeNames=[],this.routesByName={}}var t=e.prototype;return t.install=function(i,s){var o=this,h=(s===void 0?{}:s).routes,a=h===void d=c.name,u=c.path,p=[],f=o.barba.helpers.pathToRegexp(u,p);o.routeNames.indexOf(d)>-1?console.warn("[@barba/router] Duplicated route name ("+d+")"):(o.routeNames.push(d),o.routesByName[d]={keys:p,path:u,regex:f})}),i.schemaPage.route=void 0},t.init=function(){this.barba.transitions.store.add("rule",{position:1,value:{name:"route",type:"object"}}),this.barba.hooks.page(this.resolveRoutes,this),this.barba.hooks.reset(this.resolveRoutes,this)},t.resolveUrl=function(i){for(var g=document.querySelectorAll(".tabs_navigation-link");n.addEventListener("click",()=>{n.classList.contains("is-active")||(g.forEach(I=>{I.classList.remove("is-active")}),n.classList.add("is-active"))})});let m=document.querySelectorAll(".faq_question");m&&m.forEach(n=>{n.addEventListener("click",()=>{v(n,!1)}),n.addEventListener("keypress",g=>{g.key==="Enter"&&v(n,!1)})});function v(n,l){l=!l,n.setAttribute("aria-expanded",l),n.classList.toggle("is-active"),n.nextElementSibling.classList.toggle("is-active")}this.mobileSliderAnimations(),this.desktopSliderAnimations()}sectionCutIn(){let e=document.querySelector(".cut-in-section");if(!e)return;let t=gsap.matchMedia(),i=gsap.timeline();t.add("(min-width: 1200px)",()=>{i.to(e,{clipPath:"polygon(10% 10%, 90% 10%, 90% 90%, 10% 90%)"})}).add("(max-width: 1199px)",()=>{i.to(e,{clipPath:"polygon(5% 10%, 95% 10%, 95% 90%, 5% 90%)"})}),ScrollTrigger.create({trigger:e,scrub:!0,markers:!1,pin:!0,animation:i})}scaleIn(){let e=document.querySelector(".scale-grid_component"),t=document.querySelector(".scale-grid_wrapper");if(!e||!t)return;let i=gsap.timeline(),s=e.querySelector(".scale-grid_item").clientWidth,o;o=window.innerWidth/s,i.add("start").to(e,{scale:o},"start").to(".scale-grid_item img",{scale:1,yPercent:"50"},"start").to(".scale-grid_item:not(.scale-grid_item-middle)",{opacity:.3},"start").to(".scale-grid_item._1",{x:-50},"start").to(".scale-grid_item._3",{x:50},"start").to(".scale-grid_item._4",{y:50},"start"),ScrollTrigger.create({trigger:t,markers:!1,pin:!0,end:"+=1000",scrub:!0,animation:i})}parallaxImages(){if(!document.querySelector(".three-col_component"))return;gsap.matchMedia().add({isMobile:"screen and (max-width: 767px)",isDesktop:"screen and (min-width: 768px)"},t=>{let{isMobile:i,isDesktop:s}=t.conditions;if(s){let a=gsap.timeline({scrollTrigger:{start:"center center",end:"bottom center",trigger:".three-col_image-wrap.second",scrub:1.5,invalidateOnRefresh:!0,pin:".three-col_component"}});a.to(".three-col_image-wrap.first",{translateY:0,duration:1}),a.to(".three-col_image-wrap.third",{translateY:0,duration:1},"<")}if(i){let d=function(){c&&c.play(0),a&&a.play(0)},u=function(){c&&c.reverse(),a&&a.reverse()};var o=d,h=u;let a=gsap.timeline({paused:!0});a&&a.to(".three-col_image-wrap.first",{translateY:0,duration:1});let c=gsap.timeline({paused:!0});c&&c.to(".three-col_image-wrap.third",{translateY:0,duration:1});let p=gsap.timeline({scrollTrigger:{start:"center center",end:"bottom center",trigger:".three-col_image-wrap.second",scrub:1.5,invalidateOnRefresh:!0,onEnter:()=>d(),onLeaveBack:()=>u()}})}})}amenitiesAnimation(){this.sectionCutIn(),this.scaleIn(),this.parallaxImages()}init(){this.stephenCustomCode(),this.navAnimation.init(),this.sliders(),this.amenitiesAnimation(),this.footerPageTransition(),console.log(gsap.matchMedia())}},D=A;window.Webflow||(window.Webflow=[]);window.Webflow.push(()=>{let r=new D;r.init(),r.barbaInit()});})();
